Test Piece Contest
King Lear
Cirencester, Gloucestershire, England, UK March contest 1st Mid Rhondda, 2nd tie between Drybrook and Tylorstown. Prizes - 1st £50, 2nd £30, 3rd £20.
3 bands competed
